table.name: vtiger_stock
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_stock` ( `stockid` int(11) NOT NULL, `whid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `pdoid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `stocknum` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL, `stockno` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`stockid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_stockcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_stockcf` ( `stockid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`stockid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
